metadata.title: Convert Kilometers to Feet – Length Converter
metadata.description: Convert length from Kilometers to Feet, useful for interpreting metric distances in imperial.

introduction: This converter transforms length measurements from Kilometers to Feet, enabling imperial understanding of metric distances.
International distances are specified in kilometers while US measurements use feet and miles.
This converter uses the standard relationship where 1 kilometer equals exactly 3,280.84 feet.
methodology: 1 km = 3,280.84 feet. To convert kilometers to feet, multiply by 3,280.84. For example, 1 km ≈ 3,281 feet, 10 km ≈ 32,808 feet.
International races and distances need conversion to imperial units for US audiences.
Understanding large distances in feet helps with elevation and altitude interpretation.
This converter provides precise length conversions.
examples: Example 1 – Race: A 5-kilometer race is 16,404 feet.
Example 2 – Elevation: A 2-kilometer elevation gain is 6,561 feet.
Example 3 – Marathon: A 42.195-kilometer race is 138,435 feet.

faqs.question: What is the conversion from Kilometers to Feet?
faqs.answer: 1 km = 3,280.84 feet. Multiply kilometers by 3,280.84 to get feet.

faqs.question: How many kilometers in a mile?
How many feet in a kilometer?

glossary.definition: Metric unit of length equal to 1,000 meters.
Imperial unit of length equal to 0.3048 meters.
